Title: Euler systems for modular forms over imaginary quadratic fields
Abstract: © © The Authors 2015.We construct an Euler system attached to a weight 2 modular form twisted by a Grössencharacter of an imaginary quadratic field , and apply this to bounding Selmer groups.
